storyInfo: Lappland catches up to Texas. After an explosion, each party is forced to make their decision.

attributes.content: Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Salvadore Texas. What am I to think of you? Should I trust you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You are a Siracusan. They all say that violence and ambition runs in your veins. That you and your famiglia will devour this place... No, all of Columbia.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Is the man I see before my eyes truly you? So refined, so upstanding?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But I've also seen the way you throw a punch, the blood dripping between your fingers until your opponent is not able to utter even a single curse.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Which is the real you, Salvadore?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Might there come a day when you realize that your two sides are as oil and water? Might there come a day when the trail of blood in your wake catches up to you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And when that day comes, what would you choose?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: When that day comes... would you remain by my side?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A brilliant performance, signorina.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Without a doubt, you've surpassed my expectations yet again.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Actually, it's all thanks to someone in the troupe called Mr. Ben. I would never have been able to adjust so quickly without his advice.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ben?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I'm not sure we have anyone by that name at Teatro di Milano.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: He was really knowledgeable about theater and gave me some extremely helpful pointers, so I figured he was an important person here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sorry, no one comes to mind. That said, there are plenty of enthusiasts around town who are very well-versed in plays. Perhaps he was one of them.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: More importantly, I saw something on your resume that had me a bit curious. Would you mind clarifying something for me?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Sure, ask away.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You've been pursuing a pop idol career in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: We've been collaborating with that city more and more recently, but our acting industries have often been at odds with each other, due to their different backgrounds.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But even with that caveat in mind, the clips from your audition sent over by Monster Siren Records convinced me that you have some musical talent.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What this tells me, though, is that you have your sights set on a lot more than just Lungmen.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What drives you to work so hard?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Well... a lot of different reasons, I'd say.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But at the start, I didn't have anything complicated in mind. There was just someone I hoped to catch up to.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Hehe, it's just like in the script.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Every time she gazed through the window, or out the door, or across the empty streets, her eyes...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Her eyes made me feel like, one day, she would leave both us and Lungmen behind.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: 'And when that day comes, what would you choose?'
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What's the hurry? Don't you think it's a miracle for the two of us to run into each other in Siracusa again?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm busy right now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What a coincidence, so am I.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Let me guess, your job is to protect this man?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What are youâ€”
attributes.name: Bellone Bodyguard

attributes.content: Eep...!
attributes.name: Bellone Bodyguard

attributes.content: Some people really need to learn to read the room. Don't you agree, Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Go protect the target. I'll deal with her.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: U-Understood!
attributes.name: Bellone Bodyguard

attributes.content: So, want some mille-feuille?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...I'll take a piece.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha, now that's more like it!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So, Texas. Whoops, now that we're in Siracusa, I should be calling you Cellinia, right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'd rather you didn't.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Fine by me. Honestly, I find it easier that way, too. Force of habit can sure be a scary thing, can't it?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Living a leisurely life in Lungmen, occasionally bumping into each other at Rhodes Island, maybe even going on some missions together...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Makes me feel like my swords are gonna go rusty.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This ever-familiar rain is what makes me feel alive.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Swords rust in the rain.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: In Siracusa, the rain washes away the blood.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Only people like you - who walk around town with your swords out but no intention to use them - need to worry about rust.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's simple, really. Because you are.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hey, Texas, how long has it been since you were last in Siracusa?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Probably about ten years now?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Seven years and five months.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: For more than seven years, the prodigal daughter of Famiglia Texas has not set foot in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I still remember how your grandfather sent you back here to serve as a hostage. You stayed with Famiglia Saluzzo for a while...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Those days didn't last long, but we sure got along great, didn't we?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If that's your idea of 'getting along.'
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Even though you're a Columbian, you managed to win the acknowledgment of all of Siracusa's famiglie.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Though, it was truly a shame what happened at the end.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If you ask me, you ought to stay a while this time, and take a good look around.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm going back as soon as I finish my work here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh. Going back, you say?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, there's something I've always been curious about, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You betrayed the Texases and decided to become a lone wolf.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You even abandoned everything the Texases left behind in Columbia. So why do you still go by the name Texas in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's none of your business.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Lappland.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I don't plan on staying in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I will go back to Lungmen. There are people waiting for me there.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Okay then. I'll help you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I don't need your help.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Surely you don't think this is a fight you can take all on your own?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Didn't you find some buddies over in Lungmen? Didn't your time at Rhodes Island teach you that it's okay to rely on others?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Siracusa is no place for tourists.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If Rhodes Island ever plans to set up a branch office here, I would urge them to reconsider.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But most of all, I can't trust you, specifically.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ah yes, trust.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas, you know my family name, right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's right. And we Saluzzos don't place our bets lightly.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You don't need to trust me, but you do need our backing, isn't that right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or do you really intend to let the Bellones drag you around by the leash?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: With a deafening boom, the sound of an explosion suddenly tore through the air from not too far away. The flash and flame effortlessly engulfed the government official by the name of Carracci.
A car bomb?!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh? Now that's a classic.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: S-Signor Ministro!
attributes.name: Bellone Bodyguard

attributes.content: The banquet venue is under attack! All nearby famiglia associates, hurry and back us up!
attributes.name: Bellone Bodyguard

attributes.content: Damnit!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Simultaneous attacks on two fronts? Now that's interesting!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Who would have the guts to pull that off, Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Show yourself.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...I knew it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What should I do if I want to go back to Lungmen?
Ever since Texas took her first step back in this city, that question has always been on her mind.
Going by her agreement with Zaaro, the easiest way would be to obey Famiglia Bellone's every command.
But right now, Texas can already vaguely feel thatâ€”
The events unfolding in this city are not so simple.
Talk. Who sent you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You don't need to know.
attributes.name: Assassin

attributes.content: But she is not worried.
She understands Siracusa well, and knows that there is no end to these things.
She simply feels a twinge of emptiness, one that even she never expected to feel. Becauseâ€”
No one will come to her aid in this fight.
And after it's over, no one will ask her if she's hurt, or drag her off to some party.
For her, this emptiness has long since been second nature.
So much so that even after leaving Lungmen for such a brief period of time, everything about that city already seems so distant and nostalgic.
But Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The more you want to go back, the more you'll have to cut your ties.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It'll just make you sink deeper and deeper.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What I want to know is, when you finally realize that you're completely covered in mud, what will you do then?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Good to see you again, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Oh, Danbrown, you're here. Looks like I'm in luck.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You washed your car just last week, didn't you?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Nothing I can do about it. After all, it's my job to be hated.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll get it nice and clean again for you.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Why don't you take a look around while you wait?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: That's alright, I'll just wait here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your Honor, I heard that judges have it pretty good.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: They drive fancy cars, show up on TV, and even the mayor has to be extra-polite around them.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: After all, they represent Signora Sicilia's will.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I reckon I don't see any other judges like you, Signorina Lavinia, who get paint thrown on their car every other day.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: You're probably right.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I don't know about the fancy cars or TV appearances, but I could sure use a membership card to your store right about now.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sorry, our humble little shop doesn't offer VIP services.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: You look like you're in a better mood than before though. Did that one famiglia stop giving you trouble?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: All thanks to you, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I ran into them on the street yesterday, and they all steered clear of me.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Never thought there could be a judge as fair as you in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Fair, huh... They're just scared of the people behind me, that's all.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You say that, but even if you're backed by Famiglia Bellone, you still doled out punishment to a famiglia well-connected with the Bellones.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: In Siracusa, Signora Sicilia is justice itself. I don't know how many of the judges representing the interests of her old famiglie actually bother upholding any real justice.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: But deep down in my heart, I know you're the embodiment of justice.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: That isn't actually a compliment.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh right, I almost forgot. You said earlier that you were having trouble sleeping. Did you go see a doctor?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I did. The doc said I didn't have anything wrong with me physically.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Just some mental stress.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Oh, is something troubling you?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Troubling me...? I wouldn't go that far.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Honestly, this job is basically just a way for me to kill time.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I'm not exactly rich, but I'm not desperate for cash either.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I don't know what I'm supposed to be doing, Your Honor. I just don't know.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: How do you usually like to pass the time?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What?! Carracci was...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I understand. I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sorry, Danbrown. Let's chat some other time.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: As for your question just nowâ€”
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'd recommend giving the theater a shot. I often head down to watch an opera if I have the time to spare.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Danbrown exits the store.
He watches as the judge he deeply respects drive off into the rain, quickly disappearing from sight.
'She's always so busy,' he thinks to himself, drying his rain-beaded gloves on his overalls.
But nothing she does will end up mattering, will it?
Or rather, the fact that she still holds onto hope is precisely the reason why she'll be disappointed again and again.
Things weren't this complicated in the good old days. He looks at the rain falling outside the store, and suddenly remembers an afternoon many years ago.
I hope it rains a little longer, so I won't have to sweep out the garbage in the morning.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Get down!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Eekâ€”!
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Damn... Thought you were a pampered little princeling, but turns out you're pretty tough to deal with.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Tch, they're no slouches. Stand back, Rubio!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm clearly the one they're after!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I, I know!
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Tch, there's more of 'em over there too!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Slippery bastard.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What?! Isn't that Penguin Logistics'â€”
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Get down.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ah, okay!
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You dead, Gambino?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Like I'd kick the bucket so easily. Tch, never expected the real master to show up here.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Cut the crap.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: The mission's botched. Let's split while we still can.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I think I remember those two...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is everyone... gone now?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You alright?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I... think so...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're wounded. Don't move, it's easy to bleed out.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've already called for backup. They'll be here soon.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll be fine, but how...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How many people would've known about today's banquet?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Are you suggesting...?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're right. Such a large-scale, coordinated attack must've been planned for a while.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But my identity is public knowledge at this point, and it's not exactly hard to track me down.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In any case, I'm glad you arrived in time.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Carracci is dead.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What did you say?!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What?! You've gotta be shitting me...
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Carracci is... dead?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: A car bomb detonated right as he was walking by.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Carracci and three bodyguards near him died instantly.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Based on the wreckage at the scene, there was no point even taking him to the hospital.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The people who attacked us were without a doubt the same people who murdered Ministro Carracci. What could their objective be...?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Why are you here? There are so many court cars here as wellâ€”
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You should've told me sooner that Bellone invited her here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Cellinia Texas, as the first witness to the scene of Ministro Carracci's murder, you are also a suspect.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Now, I'm here to detain you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Any resistance will be treated as flouting the laws of Siracusa, and will be punished accordingly.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Texas does not resist. She understands what she sees in the judge's eyes.
Moreover...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: To all officials and associates of the famiglie, Ministro Carracci's importance to Volsinii is self-evident.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The attacks carried out on each of you will be investigated as part of the same investigation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I, Lavinia Falcone, swear upon my honor to find the identity of the murderer. This shall not go unpunished!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're not serious, are you?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Of course I am.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The string of events that just occurred makes Leontuzzo feel a bit fatigued.
And right as this thought crosses his mind, his entire world starts to spin.
Leon!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The rain continues to fall, with no signs of relenting.
